name: Chasing Childhood v0.11
description:
English:

Chasing Childhood was made during a game jam (ConfraDev GameJam 2018), by some of the jam organizers. Initially it was just a level design (in Unreal Engine 4) study, while the event was happening, then ir ended up becoming a simple game.

The main character is called Luanna, a little girl trapped in her nightmare, where she was a grown woman and her future world had fallen to pieces. She needs to find all the parts of a toy (a robot), which would turn up being her key to get out of that place and restart her life from her childhood again. But certainly with another vision, from that moment on...

The game is still only in portuguese (Brazil).

Português:

Chasing Childhood foi criado durante uma game jam (ConfraDev GameJam 2018), por alguns dos organizadores do evento. Inicialmente era apenas um simples estudo de level design (na Unreal Engine 4), enquanto o evento acontecia. Depois acabou virando um jogo simples.

A personagem principal se chama Luanna, uma garotinha presa em seu pesadelo, onde já era adulta e seu futuro mundo estava em pedaços. Ele precisa encontrar todas as partes de um brinquedo (um robô), que acabaria sendo a chave para que ela saia daquele lugar e "recomece sua vida quando era criança". Mas provavelmente com outra visão a partir daquele momento...

O jogo está ainda apenas em português (do Brasil).

TEAM:

  • Caio Filizola - 3D arts
  • Dan Medeiros - Music
  • Ícaro Milet - Game Design
  • Luana Nascimento - 2D arts
  • Marcelino Borges - Programming (who was studying level design)
